Section.Catchline: Definitions of terms used in ss. 655.77-655.91.

SectionBody.Text: As used in ss. 655.77-655.91, the term:

Subsection.Text: “Check” includes a share draft of a credit union.
“Deposit” includes a share of a credit union.
“Depositor” includes a member of a credit union.
“Institution” means any state or national bank, state or federal association, or state or federal credit union.
